titleStmt.title: Heere beginneth a mery iest of Dank Hew munk of Leicestre, and how he was foure times slain and once hanged

publicationStmt.publisher: At the long Shop adioyning vnto Saint Mildreds Churche in the Pultrie, by Iohn Alde],

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon. Suggested publication date from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
